        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="en">Plantation of Ulster -- Undertakers and their Promises</string>
            <string language="es">Establecimiento de Ulster – Sepultureros y sus promesas</string>
            <string language="ga">Plandáil Ulaidh – Déantóirí agus a nGealltanais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plantage von Ulster -- Undertakers und ihre 
Versprechungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plantation d'Ulster -- entrepreneurs et leurs 
promesses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plantação de Ulster -- undertakers e suas 
promessas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piantagione di Ulster -- undertakers e le loro 
promesse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυτεία της Ulster -- εργολάβοι και οι υποσχέσεις 
τους</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Worksheet requiring students to match illustrations with the appropriate primary and secondary sources.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo que requiere que los estudiantes relacionen ilustraciones con las fuentes principales y secundarias.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre ina gcaitheann daltaí léaráidí a mheaitseáil leis na foinsí príomha agus tánaisteacha cearta.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">History</string>
            <string language="es">Historia. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Stair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen, der Kursteilnehmer benötigt, Abbildungen 
mit den passenden Primär- und Sekundärquellen zusammenzubringen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau exigeant des étudiants d'apparier des 
illustrations avec les sources primaires et secondaires appropriées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha que requer estudantes combinar ilustrações
com as fontes preliminares e secundárias apropriadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro che richiede agli allievi di 
abbinare le illustrazioni con le sorgenti primarie e secondarie 
adatte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας που απαιτεί τους σπουδαστές για να 
ταιριάξει με τις απεικονίσεις τις κατάλληλες αρχικές και 
δευτερεύουσες πηγές.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
